Html:
I just downloaded the brand new 4.3.0 WPF.  When I extracted it I noticed the root directory was much smaller than previous builds, i.e. there are no per-spec dlls.

When I try to start it on Win7, I get the spinning circle for a few seconds than nothing further.

I downloaded and extracted twice with same results both times.

Anything I could be doing wrong on my end?  I've had no trouble with many previous WPF builds.
Something went wrong in the packing process, I'll post an updated download in a few hours.
